text: Alloh ʙar sumo ej mu'minon cang ʙo kufforro farz gardond. Vale cang dar taʙiati sumo nopisandida ast; (az saʙaʙi masaqqat va ʙisjor xatarnok ʙudanas). Va sojad ki sumo cizero noxus dored va hol on ki vaj ʙaroi sumo ʙehtar ʙosad; va sojad ki sumo cizero dust dored va hol on ki vaj ʙaroi sumo ʙad ʙosad. Va Alloh medonad ci ʙehtar ast ʙaroi sumo va hol on ki sumo onro namedoned
